title: Daggerheart Duality dice
description:
This module fully implements the unique Duality Dice mechanic from the Daggerheart TTRPG within Foundry VTT.
It streamlines gameplay by automating dice rolls, calculations, and the application of special rules.
Features:
Duality Dice Rolling: Easily roll any number of Duality Dice (d12s) with a single command or button.
Automatic High/Low Calculation: The module automatically identifies and displays the highest and lowest results of the rolled dice.
Advantage/Disadvantage Support: Seamlessly handle advantage and disadvantage by rolling two sets of Duality Dice and automatically comparing the appropriate results (highest of both for advantage, lowest of both for disadvantage).
